messages.content: place these countries in order from north to south: Lesotho, Rwanda, Morocco, Spain, Sweden, Poland, Austria

From north to south:

1.   Lesotho
2.   Rwanda
3.   Morocco
4.   Spain
5.   Sweden
6.   Poland
7.   Austria

is poland more at north than sweden?
is morocco at north of spain?
is lesotho at south of rwanda?

Yes, Poland is more at north than Sweden.

No, Morocco is not at north of Spain.

Yes, Lesotho is at south of Rwanda.
why is morocco more at north than spain?

Morocco and Spain are located in different regions of the world and therefore do not have a geographical relationship that would make one more at north than the other. Morocco is located in North Africa and Spain is located in Europe. They are not geographically close to each other and are not part of the same region.
